title: Is it possible to nameswitch accounts using a support ticket?
body:
I've been wanting to namechange for a while with an account I got a summ name I desired on and i'm currently grinding the ip on that account aswell for the name swappin'

the only reason this post is being made is I've been told by a few others that you can send in a support ticket to help swap the names for the cost of 1 namechange,  and others that you can't.

replies.body: You are correct sir! If you own both of the accounts, we can swap the names between the two for the cost of one name change. You'll need to hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll be waiting whenever you're ready ^_^!

Whenever I try to submit a ticket I get this message

"Request not found. You do not have access to request #0. It may have been solved or deleted. "

Hmmmm that's a little odd. Make sure you're going to this url specifically....

- https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

If you copy paste that url and it still sends you to the same place, try loading it in a private/incognito window to see if you can get to the right place that way.

It does indeed send me to the same place, I tried filling out what you require with the sum names and usernames needed for the summoner name change and got the same message when I hit submit. 

am I doing something wrong by trying to include the details your FAQ mention be required by entering it in the assistance with account management and changes, along with trying to give out the necessary info the in description box? 

apologies if I'm bein' a nuisance, kind of my first time doin' a ticket. :<

No worries buddy! It sounds like your browser cache is redirecting you to an older ticket that is probably closed at this point. 

I'm not sure what browser you're using, but if it's something like Chrome or Firefox you should be able to right-click on the icon and open an incognito or private browsing window. Try submitting a ticket in one of those first if possible.

If that still isn't working, you can always send us an email at support@riotgames.com and we can get that name swap going that way.
